name: docs
description: Vaporware is a computational pipeline for analyzing data from paired-end exome and genome sequencing of human cancer samples with matched normals. Its components are containerized and the pipeline runs on the [Juno high-performance computing cluster](http://hpc.mskcc.org/) at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Cencer and on [Amazon Web Services (AWS)](https://aws.amazon.com). The pipeline was written by members of the [Center for Molecular Oncology](https://cmo.mskcc.org).
